title: New: The Big Moon – Cupid
body:
London outfit **The Big Moon** just ooze charisma on their latest single, _Cupid_.

Having signed to Fiction Records for their debut full length, ahead of a busy schedule of touring, 2016 is shaping up pretty well for Juliette, Fern, Soph and Celia. Cupid has all the early promise of The Vaccines demos, without playing to the archaic, laddish tropes – a festival favourite in waiting for sure. Check it out below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
